name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: According to netizens, the current "Jack Spicy Tiao" is not a single person, but a team. After Xu Moujie was detained by the local police for abusing cats, his original team continued to operate the website and update videos under the name of "Jack Spicy Tiao". They also listed TMDCCTV, which is committed to combating animal abuse, as their partner as a provocation. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 21, the 20th International Cultural Festival of Peking University. The US booth originally displayed a rainbow flag, which was later removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 23, Beijing Tongzhou District issued a notice on the "Safety and Stability Intelligence Information Reward Measures (Trial)" to some industries to encourage everyone to report and give different levels of rewards based on the intelligence clues and actual results. The highest is 10,000 yuan and the lowest is 500 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, Station B adjusted the score of Schindler's List back to 9.4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 24, Haibin Village 3, Baoshan District, Shanghai
Special police entered the house with shields to catch dogs

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, famous scholar Zhou Ling released a video of Wang Shi sending wedding wishes to Zhao Ziyang's eldest grandson Zhao Zhiyuan, in which he mentioned missing Zhao Ziyang.
He praised Zhao Ziyang for not only inspiring the national destiny of an era, but also saving countless people who needed food.
This Weibo post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, Duoyi Network released a video of its chairman being arrested by special police at gunpoint.
However, since Shanghai even used special police to arrest an elderly German Shepherd today, Duoyi Network's case seems to be more in line with China's national conditions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 22, Anzhen, Wuxi.
An Ele.me rider stabbed and killed a Meituan rider with a knife on the street.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Official announcement! On October 24, the "Patriotic Education Law" was voted through and will come into effect on January 1, 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Taobao removed many "A-share 3000-point defense" products from its shelves. Merchants said they were deemed "illegal".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, some netizens discovered that the Weibo topic of "Hu Xijin" was banned. 
At present, Hu Xijin's Weibo and the content related to "Hu Xijin" search on Weibo have not been affected, but if the topic is added with the "#" sign, it will be displayed due to relevant laws, regulations and policies.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "The sound of the waves remains"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 24, Duoyi Network CEO Zhuo Elbow published a long article titled "You have a submachine gun, I have a Chinese heart." He believed that his experience was caused by the central government's inability to govern local governments and the excessive power of local governments. He also said that the conditions for elections are now in place and the governor should be elected by local elites.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @chumacn Judging from the writing quality and value orientation, it should be his handwriting

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Official announcement
On October 24, Xi Jinping signed a presidential decree
Li Shangfu was removed from his posts as State Councilor and Minister of National Defense;
Qin Gang was removed from his post as State Councilor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 24, the German Embassy in China issued another statement, advising Weibo users not to glorify the Nazis, use Nazi symbols, or casually call others Nazis. It also pointed out that people who combine the Israeli flag and Nazi symbols in their profile pictures are "either ignorant fools or shameless bastards," and such accounts will be permanently blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the dog captured by Shanghai special police was a retired police dog.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 24, China will issue an additional 1 trillion yuan in treasury bonds to be used for post-disaster recovery and reconstruction and to enhance disaster prevention, mitigation and relief capabilities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 23, Chengdu. At the Sandongqiao Branch of the Agricultural Bank of China, a netizen said that when his 150,000 yuan time deposit matured and was transferred, the salesperson quietly wrote the deposit as "purchase" when filling out the form, suspecting that it was changed to a wealth management product.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, at the MixC in Taiyuan, the victim's family placed a damaged Ideal car in front of the Ideal store to seek justice.
It is said that the ACC assisted driving system suddenly took over the vehicle and crashed into a 10cm tree on the roadside. The tree was fine, but the car was seriously damaged and caused 1 death and 3 injuries.
The family questioned the quality of the car.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A petition for justice on a nearby electric pole

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of October 24, there is still a Chinese worker named Cao Yongcai missing in Israel, who may still be a hostage of Hamas.
Local Chinese in Israel called on the Chinese Consulate and the Student Union to help find out. But what they got was an official reply. There was no expression of concern and sympathy, nor was there any sincere dialogue with everyone.
The consulate staff member surnamed Hu has stopped talking, and only the president of the Student Union is acting as a shield.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "I stared at the Israeli Embassy and cursed for many days. The Israeli Embassy couldn't afford to call the police."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 24, an explosion occurred in Cuiyuan Community, Meihekou City, Jilin Province. One person died and 16 were injured.
According to preliminary investigation, it was caused by improper use of gas by residents.
